page.title: 14HEALTH - DOCTORS, DENTISTS
page.content: No doctors have a{surgery}in the village.When people are ill they have to go to the doctors surgery in other places.Sometimes doctors call to see patients.In a sample 38 of familys 40% had Dr. Jolly (Belton) 9% had Dr. Graham(Coalville) 4% had Dr. Lee (Coalville) 4% had Dr. Church(Ashby) 4% had Dr. Baker (Coalville) 4% had Dr. Divigher(Coalville) 4% had Dr. Speedle(Ashby) 4% had Dr. Hoffman(Ashby) If villagers need to go to{hospital they go to Leicester,Burton or Derby. Also there isn't a{dentist}in the village so they go to Ashby,Coalville or Loughborough .The school dentist comes to the school once a year to look at the children's teeth.
